divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in front of house with dog. Noticed something move across the drive in the pasture. Told the dog to get it. He took off after the thing. The thing took off running from the dog it looked human at first then noticed it was much taller and had a lanky silvery aperance and it moved much faster then a man. It finally disappeared and the dog came back.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Rising Star
There were no other sightings in Rising Star on or around November 3rd 2012
